name: Diacombs
description:
Description

You are this microscopic creature called a Diacomb. You can combine simple diacombs together to make more fully formed diacombs. Explore and go deeper downwards in this top-down grid based puzzle game.

Thanks for playing!

Updates

4/25/21

  • If you undo very fast you may run into some undo bugs, but it is not game breaking.
  • Pushing things be be weird if game happens to be lagging
  • There is a bug with textboxes not going away when you want them
  • Text options and some other options may not be working properly
Controls
  • [Arrow Keys] to Move
  • [Z] to Undo
  • [X] to Select and to Ring Bell (found later in game)
  • [Enter] Options for rebinding controls (somewhat untested)
